messages.sophie1: Hey Jack, it's Sophie from Peak Creative. You made a website upgrade inquiry last July. Ready to move forward?
messages.sophie3: No worries, life happens! What was the main blocker? Budget, timeline, or other fires?
messages.jack1: Hi Sophie! Yes sorry, summer was crazy with client launches. The website is definitely still something I need.
messages.jack2: Honestly a bit of all three. I need something that looks pro but doesn't take forever or cost a fortune.
messages.jack3: I've seen some of your portfolio work and I really like the style, just a bit concerned about the investment side of things.
messages.jack4: Yes that works, for me that call would work great tomorrow. What times do you have?
messages.jack5: I am good, thanks for reaching out :)
messages.sophie4: I completely hear you Jack. We actually specialize in high-impact builds that balance that 'pro' look with efficiency. That's exactly why I'd love for you to have a quick call with one of our strategists. They can look at your specific needs and show you how we can make the budget work without compromising on quality.
messages.sophie5: You can select a time in our calendar page: [link]. I'll pass our conversation notes so our team has everything prepped. You will be in good hands Jack!
messages.sophie6: Your call is booked for tomorrow at 3:30pm, if you have any questions or need to re-schedule, just let me know üòä
messages.sophie7: You are welcome, have a great day
